channel.title: [pi] donator crown
channel.description:
hey guys, i cannot seem to find a working tut on how to add donator crowns onto pi. i have the image i wish to use. i have added the donator right into the source. all i need is to add the image and connect it to the player right.
if anyone could help i would be greatful
